1.Name: Welcome to the Simulator!
1.Message: Greetings and welcome to Hydra's Pipe Simulator! I have spent an unimaginable amount of time working on this project, so I really do hope that you enjoy it. I manually update this every tour, and am always finding ways to improve this.

2.Name: Update Info - 2.0.0
2.Message:
The 2.0.0 update is rolling out!
You can get the new update from

https://github.com/HalfHydra/Pipe-Simulator/releases

This update includes many many new features including
- The news section! You can now easily check for updates to the simulator, see what's new, and more!
- Inventory Section! Now the game keeps track of what is and what is not new, as well as how many of each item you've received.
- An easter egg! Can you find the special way to pull the entire rest of the pipe?
- Voice clips! Drivers now have their voice clips included in the simulator.

Thanks for using the simulator! I hope you enjoy it.

The Gold Mario Pipe was added!

3.Name: The Kamek Tour has been added!
3.Message: The Kamek Tour pipes have been added! Please note that any 50 pipes are the best guess, and will be updated when their true value amounts are revealed.
